paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the economic model proposed by Anderlini and Canning, a parameterized class of generalized abstract fuzzy economies together with an associated abstract rationality function, and show that the structural stability of this model implies its robustness to epsilon-equilibria. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The robustness of generalized abstract fuzzy economies in generalized convex spaces
